mapper.select: SELECT m.mafaSeq ,m.mafaStausCd ,p.prdtName ,pol.pdolQty ,po.pdorNum FROM manufacture AS m LEFT JOIN productorderlist AS pol ON m.productorderlist_pdolSeq = pol.pdolSeq LEFT JOIN product AS p ON pol.product_prdtSeq = p.prdtSeq LEFT JOIN productorder AS po ON pol.productorder_pdorSeq = po.pdorSeq;
